name: garden-dev-cluster
description: Garden development cluster CDK and CFN quickstart, batteries included.

scripts.synth: cdk synth eks-blueprint && cdk synth garden-dev-cluster
scripts.rain: rain fmt cdk.out/eks-blueprint.template.json > eks-blueprint.template.yaml && rain fmt cdk.out/garden-dev-cluster.template.json > garden-dev-cluster.template.yaml
scripts.upload-assets: cdk-assets publish -p cdk.out/eks-blueprint.assets.json && cdk-assets publish -p cdk.out/garden-dev-cluster.assets.json
scripts.upload-templates: aws s3 cp garden-dev-cluster.template.yaml s3://garden-cfn-public-releases/dev-cluster/$CDK_RELEASE_VERSION/garden-dev-cluster.template.yaml && aws s3 cp eks-blueprint.template.yaml s3://garden-cfn-public-releases/eks-blueprint/$CDK_RELEASE_VERSION/eks-blueprint.template.yaml

author: Garden Technologies, Inc. <info@garden.io>
